text:
Sometimes has Apache too many (about 150) internet connections in "close_wait" 
state and cannot accept any new connection more. Apache restart helps. I cannot 
reproduce the Problem any time I wish.

System:
-------
SunOS s96sp0w1 5.7 Generic_106541-16 sun4u sparc SUNW,Ultra-80
Apache/1.3.26 (Unix) mod_ssl/2.8.10 OpenSSL/0.9.6c

tcp_time_wait_interval 60000
tcp_keepalive_interval 7200000


...
Timeout 300
KeepAlive Off
MaxKeepAliveRequests 100
KeepAliveTimeout 15
MinSpareServers 5
MaxSpareServers 20
StartServers 15
MaxClients 150
MaxRequestsPerChild 500
...
creator: spetrovski@to.com

text:
This is a configuration problem. A more appropriate forum might be:
http://httpd.apache.org/lists.html#http-users

Thanks for using apache!
creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
